This message reports the precise BDS time of the most recent navigation solution includingvalidity flags and an accuracy estimate.

column6: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch.See the description of iTOW for details.
BDS time of week (rounded to seconds)
Fractional part of SOW (range: +/-500000000).The precise BDS time of week in seconds is:SOW + fSOW * 1e-9
BDS week number of the navigation epoch
